check_freq_input¶

pysm.check_freq_input(freqs)[source] [edit on github]¶

Function to check that the input to Model.get_emission is a np.ndarray.

This function will convet input integers or arrays to a single element numpy array.

Parameters
freqs: int, float, list, ndarray
Returns
ndarray

Frequencies in numpy array form.
